thread.title: Earnings will put floor on the market's drop, says Ken Kamen

title: Earnings will put floor on the market's drop, says Ken Kamen
text:
Earnings will put floor on the market's drop, says Ken Kamen 3:06pm EDT - 04:26 
Mercadien Asset Management's president also tells Reuters' Fred Katayama investors should stay away from Facebook and some social media stocks because the narrative is changing. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
